properties.Title: China Eximbank and Bank of China provide a $119.4 million USD syndicated loan for the 220 MW Surajganj 2 Combined Cycle Dual Fuel Power Project (Linked to Project ID#69033)
properties.Funding Agencies: Bank of China (BOC)|Export-Import Bank of China
properties.Implementing Agencies: Siemens|China Energy Engineering Group|China Machinery and Equipment Import and Export Co (CMEIE)|Fujian Electric Power Survey & Design Institute (FEDI)|North-West Power Generation Company Limited (NWPGCL)
